javax.xml.bind
Interface JAXBIntrospector

public interface JAXBIntrospector

Provide access to JAXB xml binding data for a JAXB object. WORK IN PROGRESS: Intially, the intent of this class is to just conceptualize how a JAXB application developer can access xml binding information, independent if binding model is java to schema or schema to java. Since accessing the XML element name related to a JAXB element is a highly requested feature, demonstrate access to this binding information. The factory method to get a JAXBIntrospector instance is javax.xml.bind.JAXBContext.getJAXBIntrospector().

See Also:
JAXBContext.getJAXBIntrospector()

Method Summary
 javax.xml.namespace.QName getElementName(java.lang.Object jaxbElement)
          Get xml element qname for jaxbElement.
 boolean isElement(java.lang.Object object)
          Return true iff object represents a JAXB xml element.
 

Method Detail

isElement

boolean isElement(java.lang.Object object)

Return true iff object represents a JAXB xml element.

Parameter object is a JAXB element for following cases:

  1. It is an instance of javax.xml.bind.JAXBElement.
  2. The class of object is annotated with @XmlRootElement.

See Also:
getElementName(Object)

getElementName

javax.xml.namespace.QName getElementName(java.lang.Object jaxbElement)

Get xml element qname for jaxbElement.

Parameters:
jaxbElement - is an object that isElement(Object) returned true.
Returns:
xml element qname associated with jaxbElement; null if jaxbElement is not a JAXB Element.
